title: Jesus Turns Death to Glory: Jeremy and Karen on Memento Mori and the Deaths of our Fathers
description: Jeremy and Karen tackle the aspect of our current society that seeks to turn away from consideration of death, and along the way, we tell the stories of the deaths of those we have loved, our struggles with regret and the need for those who are willing to listen.
